inputs.name: url
inputs.title: FHIR Server Base URL

inputs.name: bundle_resource_ids
inputs.description: If providing multiple IDs, separate them by a comma and a space. e.g. id_1, id_2, id_3
inputs.title: ID(s) for Bundle resources present on the server

inputs.name: bundle_resource_input
inputs.title: Bundle resources to create on the server
